remarks: Use a bijection with a metric space to construct a metric on a set. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
statement:
metf1o.2 $e |- N = ( x e. Y , y e. Y |-> ( ( F ` x ) M ( F ` y ) ) ) $.
metf1o $p |- ( ( Y e. A /\ M e. ( Met ` X ) /\ F : Y -1-1-onto-> X ) -> N e. ( Met ` Y ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
